Main features:
• No need to look for more wallpaper apps, this app accurately determines and selects device screen wallpapers your iPhone screen size.
• Support Full HD, QHD, HQ, 1080p, 4K wallpapers as background.
• Add wallpapers to favorites without downloading.
• You can save all these Full HD / 4K Soccer Backgrounds in your phone.
• Share images with friends on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Whatsapp and Google+

App permission notice
• Photos/Media/Files: Needed to allow you to save and use a custom wallpaper.
• Storage: Needed to display or use the currently set background.
